DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase 1, open label, dose escalation study of ARQ 197 in patients with advanced/recurrent solid tumors. The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability and recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) of ARQ 197.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of ARQ 197 in Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients who did not respond or are refractory to available therapy or for whom no standard effective systemic therapy exists.
